## AbstractDevice.runLoop() method

Begins a rendering loop

**Signature:**

```typescript
runLoop(func: (device: AbstractDevice) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  func | (device: [AbstractDevice](doc/markdown/./device.abstractdevice.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; void | The function to be executed at every frame |
